channel.title: Recipes on Daan Zillen
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on Daan Zillen

item.title: Omelette du fromage
item.description: Crack a few eggs in a bowl, stir like your life depends on it. Add to a pan and keep stirring untill most of runny egg is gone, then let it settle. Add some salt and pepper and a bucket of cheese. Enjoy.
item.content:encoded: Crack a few eggs in a bowl, stir like your life depends on it. Add to a pan and keep stirring untill most of runny egg is gone, then let it settle. Add some salt and pepper and a bucket of cheese. Enjoy.
